summary: Darker version of the dragonscale armor set and shield
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] I tried not to stray too far from the vanilla here since I quite liked it, just felt it was a bit wishy-washy :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Installation :[/b][/color] You can just extract to your data folder / install using a mod manager as normal.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Optional RefMap and Meshes File :[/b][/color] I liked the way the dawnguard metal turned out when slightly darkened so decided to have a go at making a similar reflection map using it and some of the other refmaps that came with the game, then edited the meshes to use my one. I guess it could also be used with the vanilla textures if you ignore my main file and just install this.. not tried that yet.
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]
Optional DawnFury DragonScale Cuirass :[/b][/color] The vanilla female dragonscale cuirass has some nasty mesh clipping so I had a quick search to see if anyone might be using something that fixes it and came across [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17087/?]Dragonscale Cuirass Re-meshed[/url] by DawnFury. My edit to this mesh is purely to make it use the optional reflection map I made, so if you just want my darker textures but with his mesh you will have to nab it from his page.. hope this makes sense, and thanks to DawnFury for the nice permission settings on that file ! :)

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Lossless Versions :[/b][/color] These 24/32bit versions give a nicer depth to the textures and should be free from any artifacts, but are much more memory intensive so if you are already low on V-RAM then avoid :).

[b][color=Lightsteelblue][b]Screenshots :[/b][/color] [/b]I use an edited [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936/?/]RealVision Nova ENB[/url] with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?/]Enhanced Lights And FX[/url], alongside hundreds of other mods :P


[center][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b]
[b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57178/?]

Darker Jester Clothes[/url]
